dc_title_s: Midland County - Midland, Michigan, official road map 1971
dc_description_s: Extent: 2 maps on 1 sheet | Abstract: County road map and city street map. | Notes: Title from panel.|Includes text, indexes to roads and streets, 3 ancillary maps, and illustrations.|Ancillary maps: City of Coleman, Midland County, Michigan -- Village of Sanford, Midland County, Michigan -- Midland area. | Scale 1:60,000. 1 in. = 5,000 ft|Scale 1:21,600. 1 in. = 1,800 ft
dc_publisher_s: Published by the Midland County Road Commission and the Midland County Board of Commissioners
